info.name: Oath of the Depths Sacred Oath

description.p: Those that follow this Oath believe in finding the true secrets that dwell not only within the sea, but also on land. At times called Blue Knights or Deep Knights, these paladins exist to help pave the way for those who carry light to spread it where only darkness would once reside.
Explore the Unknown: Find what is unseen. Build safe havens for those that would follow you.
Dive Deep: Push deeper than the surface and draw out unique traits in yourself and those around you to know all you can about yourself.
Vast Horizons: Understand your ideals and beliefs, but be open and understanding to new ideas that would augment them for the better.
You gain oath spells at the paladin levels listed.

td.em: create or destroy water, zephyr strike

description.p: When you take this Oath at 3rd level, you gain the two following channel divinity options.

Sea’s Grasp: As an action, you can invoke the call of the sea to unleash the primordial forces of the deep. Creatures within a 10ft radius sphere centered on a point within 30ft of you must succeed on a Strength or Dexterity saving throw (its choice) or be grappled for the duration. While restrained, the creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a success, it frees itself.

Aquatic Explorer: You may use your channel divinity as an action to embrace the freedom provided by sea. After using this action, your body adapts to the depths of the sea providing you a 40ft swim speed and the ability to speak and breath underwater for 1 hour.

description.p: Starting at 7th level, you exude an aura that aids in nullifying the restraining effects of the area around you. You and allies within 10 feet of you ignore difficult terrain and are immune to the grappled condition. At 18th level this range increases to 30 feet.

div.p: While a number of Paladins consider this oath, it is often viewed to be a burden as well rather than a blessing. Those that make this Oath must fully dedicate themselves to the exploration of the unknown and rarely will they get the oppurtunity to settle unless their Oath is fufilled to its greatest potential.

description.p: Starting at level 15, you cannot be stopped simply by being held down or restrained. You are immune to the restrained and paralyzed condition.

sheet.description: You are immune to the restrained and paralyzed condition.

description.p: At 20th level, you can become emblazoned with the obvious freedom of the sea. As an action, you may undergo a transformation that provides the following benefits for 1 minute.

ul.li: You gain a swim and walking speed of 60 feet.
Attacks of opportunity are made against you with disadvantage.
You may use your bonus action to teleport to an enemy within 30ft of you and make one melee attack against them.

description.p: Once you use this feature, you can’t use it again until you finish a long rest.
